description:
Lezyne’s Drive line is known for their efficient designs and pumping power, this new compact version is no exception. Smaller than ever, the Pocket Drive is a jersey friendly pump that can take your tires all the way up to 160psi.

  • Overlapping design contains a flexible hose for easy pumping
  • Threads onto Presta and Schrader valves and has an integrated valve core tool
  • Rebuildable pump head for years of reliable service
  • Machined aluminum design keeps weight low and strength high
  • Pumps up to 160psi
name: Lezyne Pocket Drive Pump
